st:Description.name: AssemblyGeneral
st:Description.st:role: Setting to manage Assembly Design (General) options
st:Description.st:detailedRole: Assembly Design (General) setting contains all options necessary to Assembly Design (General) commands

st:attribute.Name: WarningWhenMovingFixT
st:attribute.st:role: Attribute managing the extension of a move to the components involved in a FixTogether
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: When a component involved in a FixTogether is moved, same move may be applied to all other components involved in the same FixTogether, according to this attribute's value

st:enum.st:role: Never extend move to all components involved in a FixTogether
Ask question to extend move to all component involved in a FixTogether
always extend move to all component involved in a FixTogether

st:default.st:role: By default Move is never extended

st:attribute.Name: autoSwitchMode
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Mode to decide if automatic switch to Design mode

st:enum.st:role: Automatic switch to Design mode available
Automatic switch to Design mode unavailable

st:default.st:role: By default automatic switch to Design mode

st:attribute.Name: RealUpdtStatus
st:attribute.st:role: Attribute to manage Compute Update at Open mode (automatic or manual)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Automatically computes exact update status, or highlight update icon on opening a document

st:default.st:role: By default manually compute exact update status

st:attribute.Name: UpdDepth
st:attribute.st:role: Attribute to manage update propagation depth (active level or all the levels).

st:enum.st:role: Update is done for only for active level.
Update is done for all the levels.

st:default.st:role: By default Update is done for all the levels.

st:attribute.Name: UpdAuto
st:attribute.st:role: Attribute to manage IsUpToDate mode (automatic or manual)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Automatically computes real update status, or highlight update icon whenever a modification is performed

st:enum.st:role: Update icon gets highlighted whenever a modification is performed

st:default.st:role: By default update icon gets highlighted whenever a modification is performed
